title: BIRTHDAY PARTY CRUISE
details: Enjoy an action packed day sailing Curlew Escape to the Tangalooma Wrecks and snorkelling amongst the clear water surrounded by hundreds of brightly coloured fish.

title: HENSâ€™ PARTY CRUISE
details: Slip away for a romantic short overnight break aboard Curlew Escape. Laze away the afternoons and watch the sunset over the water with beautiful nature all around.

title: SUNSET CRUISE
details: Enjoy a late afternoon sail amongst the western Moreton Bay islands and watch the sunset over the water with the city as the backdrop.
